Relationships close deals.
Ten Touches
remembers them all.

The mobile CRM for salespeople who sell through trust, not scripts. Capture contacts by voice, follow up with intent, and see which actions actually win deals.

10

The Methodology

Ten touches. One relationship.

Research shows it takes an average of ten meaningful interactions to build real trust. Ten Touches tracks your progress so no relationship falls through the cracks.

Every interaction counts

Calls, coffees, emails, events — each touch type builds momentum differently. Log each one, rate the outcome, and set the next reminder in seconds. The app tracks which ones work best for you.

Call
Email
SMS
Coffee
Meeting
Gift
Event
Intro
Voice
Check-in
Momentum builds trust

Each touch compounds. A call after a coffee after an email creates a rhythm your clients feel. Ten Touches shows you the pattern — and keeps you moving.

Relationship Memory

Not contacts. Relationships.

Every client card captures what matters — their business, their interests, their dog's name. Tap to select sports, pets, and personal details, or speak naturally and let on-device AI do the rest.

Voice-powered by Apple Intelligence™

Speak naturally — “Add Sarah, she's into rugby and has two dogs” — and on-device AI structures it instantly. Fast, powerful, and completely private. Nothing leaves your iPhone.

Repeat Business

Search by memory, not ID

Find people by their team, their pet, their company — however your brain remembers them.

Personal, not corporate

Sports, pets, interests — the details that turn a sales call into a real conversation.

Quality scoring that guides

Testimonials, referrals, feedback, repeat business — see where each relationship can grow.

How Your Mind Works

Search by memory, not by name.

You don't think in alphabetical order. You remember that someone supports Manchester United, rides a motorbike, or has a cat called Whiskers. Ten Touches lets you find anyone the way your brain actually works — by the personal details that stick.

Football fan
Has a dog
Loves F1

Tap to select, instant to find

Sports, pets, hobbies, family — tap the icons that matter and find anyone in seconds.

Not a phone book — a relationship map

Forget scrolling through surnames. Search “dog” and find every client who has one. Search “F1” and start a conversation that matters.

Pipeline You Can Feel

See your deals the way they actually stand.

No spreadsheets. No fake probabilities. Card-based opportunities with honest confidence scores and real deal values — glanceable in under ten seconds, designed for life between meetings.

Instant pipeline awareness

What's live, what's big, what's close, what's weak — no filtering required.

Confidence, not false precision

A human progress ring replaces meaningless percentages. That's how salespeople actually think.

Built for your pocket

In a lift, before a call, at the end of the day. Traditional CRMs assume a desk — this assumes reality.

Intelligent Follow-Up

Do what you're ready to do.

Not a task list — a context-aware execution engine. Filter by action type, match your energy, and knock out follow-ups without decision fatigue. Every reminder already tells you who, why, what, and when.

Call
Email
SMS
Coffee
Meeting
LinkedIn
X
Presentation

Filter by context, not priority

Got 10 minutes? Tap SMS. In the car? Tap Phone Call. At your desk? Tap Email.

Zero context switching

Each card contains the client, the opportunity, the intent, and the deadline. No digging required.

Relationship momentum

Casual check-ins, coffees, and events sit alongside sales actions — because relationships aren't just deals.

Honest Revenue

The truth about every deal. Early enough to act.

Total value versus risked revenue, side by side. A four-stage model anyone can understand — Prospect, Proposal, PO, Paid — with voice capture right where you need it, the moment after a call.

£18,000risked revenue
£4.5k£9.0k£13.5k£18.0k
ProspectProposalPOPaid

Revenue you can believe

£18k potential vs £4.5k probable — you can't lie to yourself on this screen.

Voice notes at the point of truth

Capture objections, hesitations, and next steps by speaking — no laptop, no lost nuance.

Simple mental model

“We're at proposal, so it's worth half.” No jargon, no probability theatre.

Sell Smarter

Learn what works. Get better.

The Optimise dashboard isn't analytics for your manager — it's behavioural intelligence for you. See which actions win deals, what works at each stage, and how to close faster with less effort. Self-coaching, not surveillance.

Pick your winners

See which touch types perform best when you use them. “When you do this, it works.”

Match the moment

The same action can succeed or fail depending on timing. See what opens deals and what closes them.

Activity cadence, not quotas

Set your own rhythm. Track consistency without pressure. Sales success is about cadence, not spikes.

Start remembering everyone.

Ten Touches is coming to iOS. Be among the first to build stronger relationships, follow up with confidence, and sell smarter.
